accessibility_text:
Schools & Educators

# 

Field Trip Fund

Support local students with GRAM’s Field Trip Fund!

**Growing Young Minds**  

The Grand Rapids Art Museum’s Field Trip Fund advances equitable learning through accessible art experiences by removing financial barriers and promoting accessibility to the visual arts for Michigan students.

For eligible PreK-12 schools, GRAM’s Field Trip Fund covers student admission and participation fees for school tours and art-making workshops and provides transportation reimbursement to assist with bus expenses.

The per unit cost is $38/student. This includes everything (hard costs, transportation, staff time, overhead).

Through these interactive experiences, students will engage in transformative cultural experiences that inspire creativity, critical thinking, constructive dialogue, empathy, and self-expression.

**Field Trip Fund: Impact by the Numbers**  
 _Covering the period from October 1, 2022 to January 14, 2023_

  * 1,381 Students who participated in guided tours
  * 1,259 Students who took part in artmaking workshops
  * 338 Teachers, school staff, and chaperones who attended
  * 17 Partnering school districts
  * 27 Participating schools
  * 80 Participating classrooms

**This past year, we welcomed Pre-K students for Early Learner programs:**

  * 135 PreK students
  * 71 adults (teachers, support staff, and chaperones)
  * 11 classrooms
  * 9 GRAM visits total (for YMCA of Greater Grand Rapids – Great Start Readiness Program and fo...
collections_text:
## Start the new year with a day of wellness at GRAM

Join us for [Slow Art Day](https://www.artmuseumgr.org/events/creative-mindfulness-event) Saturday, Jan 17 and explore the art of slowing down with mindfulness activities for all ages throughout the museum. 

[ Learn More ](https://www.artmuseumgr.org/events/creative-mindfulness-event)

[ Current Exhibition  The Matter of Awe: Landscapes in Art Nov 22, 2025 — Aug 16, 2026 ](https://www.artmuseumgr.org/exhibitions/the-matter-of-awe) [ Current Exhibition  As We Rise: Photography from the Black Atlantic Dec 6, 2025 — Apr 26, 2026 ](https://www.artmuseumgr.org/exhibitions/as-we-rise-photography-from-the-black-atlantic) [ Current Exhibition  Parisa Ghaderi: For Dancing in the Streets Nov 22, 2025 — Apr 26, 2026 ](https://www.artmuseumgr.org/exhibitions/parisa-ghaderi-for-dancing-in-the-streets)
